name: On a plane, do you think you would be best as?
When you're given a briefing paper, what do you do with it?

answers.red: Skim it for the salient points
answers.white: Read it carefully and act on it
answers.green: Rewrite it and send it back
answers.blue: Send it back, I issue briefing papers, I don't read them

name: In a conversation, what are you aiming for?
Which of these things do you value most about employment?
Which of these things would make you happiest?

answers.red: A life in which others look up to me
answers.white: A life in which I ploughed my own furrow

name: Which of these activities might suit you best?
